content:
That sounds like a delicious and healthy breakfast routine! Granola with almond milk is a great combo. Making your own granola can be a fun and rewarding experience, and it's amazing how much you can customize it to your taste preferences.

If you're looking for other breakfast ideas, I'd be happy to suggest some vegan options. Overnight oats, smoothie bowls, and tofu scrambles are all great alternatives. Or, if you're feeling adventurous, you could try making some vegan pancakes or waffles!

By the way, have you considered using different types of non-dairy milk in your granola bowl? There are so many options out there, like oat milk, soy milk, cashew milk, and hazelnut milk, each with their own unique flavor and nutritional profile. You might find that you prefer one over almond milk or that you like to mix and match different types for variety.

Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with!
